relay.desc: The relay to use to connect with your Bridge
relay.name: Relay Address

uuid.desc: The secret UUID needed to pair with your Bridge
uuid.name: UUID

dementiaMode.desc: Activating Dementia Mode will perform a full-wipe every time Zen is closed
dementiaMode.name: Dementia Mode

doNotRemember.desc: Automatically sign out every time Zen is closed
doNotRemember.name: Do Not Remember

loginTimeout.desc: The amount of seconds Zen will wait before automatically logging you in
loginTimeout.name: Auto Login Timeout

secondaryEncryption.desc: Encrypt and decrypt messages within your account using a client-side key
secondaryEncryption.name: Secondary Encryption

secondaryEncryptionString.desc: The 256-bit string used as a secondary encryption key
secondaryEncryptionString.name: Secondary Encryption Key

stylePath.desc: The location of your custom CSS file
stylePath.name: Custom Style
